Who died in childbirth in 1772?	Margaret Miller
Who died in childbirth in 1772?	Margaret Miller
Who died in 1832?	Margaret Miller.
Is watt commemorated by statuary in George Square, Glasgow and Princes Street, Edinburgh?	Yes.
Was watt a gentleman, greatly respected by other prominent men of the Industrial Revolution?	Yes.
Was watt a fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh and the Royal Society of London?	Yes.
Four years after opening his shop , Watt began what?	Watt began to experiment with steam after his friend, Professor John Robison, called his attention to it.
Was Watt ranked 22nd in Michael H. Hart 's list of the most influential figures in history ?	Yes.
